mapper.select: select connid as connid from WINK1.callinfo where connidfst in (select connidfst from WINK1.callinfo where connid = #{connidfst}) order by connid

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd') + ((timets + 32400) / 86400),'YYYY-MM-DD') as row_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd') + ((timets + 32400) / 86400),'hh24miss') starttime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd') + ((timets + 32400) / 86400),'hh24miss') endtime, connid as connid, decode(calltype,1,'Internal',2,'Inbound',3,'Outbound',4,'Consult',null) as calltype, (SELECT NAME FROM WINK1.codes WHERE ID = EVENT) as event, (SELECT DES FROM WINK1.codes WHERE ID = EVENT) as des, thisdn as thisdn, otherdn as otherdn, thirddn as thirddn, thisqueue as thisqueue, c.group_name as group_name, b.agent_id as agent_id, b.agent_name as agent_name, decode(a.rparty,1,'상담사',2,'고객',null) as rparty FROM WINK1.calldetail a, (select distinct company_cd, company_name, dept_cd, dept_name, team_cd, agent_dbid, agent_id, agent_name from WDM.ax_a_struct) b, WINK1.ax_vdn_org_skill c WHERE a.person = b.agent_dbid(+) and a.thisdn = c.vdn_number(+) AND (connid in (${connid})) ORDER BY seq
select session_id as sid, conn_id as cid from ivr_call_info where conn_id = #{conn_id} order by session_id
